I don't want to rock the boat or anything, but I find it strange that the masters of dissenting opinion are strangely absent for the past while. There's been no word from Brady and his one sentence entries about the evils of gun ownership, no new posts by Galileo and his constant referencing of discredited mouthpieces paid for by the Joyce Foundation, no sign of Simone and her talk about sexual compensation through gun ownership, or any of the other big names of gun hatred on here (she seems far more interested in suggesting that poor women are being made poorer in order to make rich white men all the richer).
 
 Could it be the simple fact that Wisconsin will soon allow concealed carry like any other state and their last bastion of hope, Illinois, will eventually be taken away from them? Could it be that the Gunwalker Scandal has shamed them into silence because the ATF proved to be a bunch of corrupt thugs who contributed who the violence and death in Mexico? Or could it be they lost their free 'net access by getting fired from their jobs?

Maybe they were scared off by us rooten tooten gun-slingen yahoo's.It could happen.If I were scared all the time at the mere mention of the word 'gun'I would be long gone,with my tail betwixt my legs.emoticon_xchicken;)
